content: Accessories for large opening firestop systems Accessories for CFS-BL / CP 648 / CP 675 Firestop systems ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- ### FEATURES:Features Z-frame – helps hold CFS-BL / CP 648 / CP 675 firestop systems in place in large openings T-bar – helps separate CFS-BL / CP 648 / CP 675 firestop systems in large openings L-sleeve – steel angle supports CFS-BL / CP 648 / CP 675 firestop systems in large openings Applications Accessories to be used in combination with CFS-BL / CP 648 / CP 675 Firestop systems For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 283855 - Z-frame CP 675T - Package Size 1 pc - 283854 - T-separator bar CP 675T - Package Size 1 pc - 283893 - L-sleeve CP 675T - Package Size 1 pc
